inline.description:
Channel shortlinking still works when placed in brackets
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Post the following, where "somechannel" is the name of an existing public channel:

    "(~somechannel)"
inline.expectedResult: • The "~somechannel" text is hyperlinked and links to the channel

customFields.Related ticket(s): Linking channels doesn't work right after an opening parenthesis — MM-15749
